description: Independent research is offered for students dedicated to an in-depth research experience. In conjunction with a faculty supervisor, a student conceives and performs a research project leading to the production of a major piece of work such as a research paper or poster presentation. Independent research requires permission of a supervisor and completion of an independent research form available at the Registrar's Office or its website.
name: IR/
notes: An Independent Research form is required by the last day to add in order to be
officially registered for an Independent Research.
title: Independent Research
